DOC.brief_summary: The aim study find prevalence aged-related macular degeneration ( AMD ) Slovak Republic . The outcome project epidemiology survey , prevalence wet form AMD relation demographic data , patient´s anamnesis , nutrition , co-morbidities etc .
DOC.detailed_description: It´s cross-sectional epidemiological survey , multi-centric , non-interventional 1 . Patients fill questionnaire demography data , anamnesis , risk factor . 2 . Patients assess use Amsler grid . 3 . Patient´s back eye examine fundus camera ( search long-term back eye change , retina vessel , macula surround tissue ) retina specialist . 4 . Patient undergoes optical coherent tomography ( OCT ) examination ( cross-section fovea macula ) retina specialist . The project actively screen patient wAMD . All patient sign inform consent . The process screen hold certain timeframe ( cca . 2 month ) select area Slovak Republic .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Adult patient ( aged≥55 year ) select area Slovak Republic 2 . Patients home base far 35 km nearest center ( center : Bratislava , Nitra , Nové Zámky , Trenčín , Bojnice , Žilina , Martin , Ružomberok , Banská Bystrica , Zvolen , Poprad , Prešov , Košice , Trebišov ) 3 . Patient´s inform consent sign . Patients meet inclusion criterion
